scripts.dev: rm -rf dist && concurrently "pnpm -C packages/vue-global-loader run watch" "pnpm -C playground install && pnpm -C playground run dev --host"
scripts.build:playground: pnpm build && pnpm -C playground run build
scripts.test: pnpm build && pnpm -C tests install && pnpm -C tests run test
scripts.test:gui: rm -rf dist && concurrently "pnpm -C packages/vue-global-loader run watch" "pnpm -C tests install && pnpm -C tests run test:gui"
